AutobattlerRelic:AutobattlingMode.NAME: Autobattling Mode
DESCRIPTIONS:
At the start of each turn, play the top 5 cards of your deck, plus 1 more for each master energy over 3.
By default you draw no cards at turn start.

AutobattlerRelic:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
AutobattlerRelic:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

AutobattlerRelic:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
